Built PAMGuard installers are released approximately every three to six months.

Each release is tagged on [GitHub](https://github.com/PAMGuard/PAMGuard/releases) and for recent versions a snapshot copied to the [Zenodo research repository](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.18710851) at [CERN](https://home.cern/about).

Zenodo provides a Digital Object Identifier (DOI) to each release which can be used to cite the software. e.g. Gillespie, D., & Macaulay, J. (2026). PAMGuard (V2.02.18). Zenodo. <https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.18710851>.

[Go to Zenodo](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.18710851) for more citation styles for different releases.
